entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Coronation
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coronation 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: E 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing rain mixed with snow. High zero except minus 5 over northern sections.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or snow mixed with rain. Local snowfall amount 2 cm over northern sections. Wind east 30 km/h. High zero except minus 5 over northern sections. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow or freezing rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
